about_the_game:
Tap to craft and dig deep into Tap Craft, the idle crafting and city building game of 2023! Build a bustling town, dig up rare ores, expand to new islands and become a survival expert!
This is an idle crafting game like you've never seen before. Mine up rare metals, grow food to feed your thriving idle settlement, unlock new buildings, craft new items, and expand to new islands in Tap Craft!

Features

Become an Idle Survival Expert
- Spawn on randomly generated islands
- Dig & mine rare ores and resources
- Expand to new islands
- Upgrade your idle settlement

Craft Your Town
- Craft tools to dig out a civ
- Idle and watch your town thrive
- Use tools to construct buildings to craft further

Mine Rare Metals
- Dig into the earth to unearth treasures
- Multiple types of ore to dig
- Craft tools needed for rare metals such as gold and silver

Retire & Keep Idling
- A unique genre fusion - play as much or as little as you like
- Harvest Resources or let your town do it for you
- Come back the next day and see what your workers have produced



Lovers of crafting, city buildings and mining games will be hooked on this epic survival adventure. Enjoy Tap Craft!

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
